quotes.quote: Leave the road, take the trails.
quotes.author: Pythagore

quotes.quote: The fears we don't face become our limits.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: And suddenly you realize your travels were more education than vacation.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I—I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the difference.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: The earth has music for those who listen.
quotes.author: Shakespeare

quotes.quote: So lovely was the loneliness of a wild lake.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: The impulse to travel is one of the hopeful symptoms of life.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.quote: Fear is a reaction. Courage is a decision.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.quote: Blessed are the curious for they shall have adventures.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Some beautiful paths can't be discovered without getting lost.
quotes.author: Erol Ozan

quotes.quote: If happiness is the goal-- and it should be, then adventures should be a priority.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: To put your hands in a river is to feel the chords that bind the earth together.
quotes.author: Barry Lopez

quotes.quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: The greatest reward and luxury of travel is to be able to experience everyday things as if for the first time.
quotes.author: Bill Bryson

quotes.quote: Once a year, go someplace you've never been before.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: We travel, some of us forever, to seek other places, other lives, other souls.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: We can never have enough of nature.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Go with the flow.
quotes.author: Advice from a river

quotes.quote: Immerse yourself in nature.
quotes.author: Advice from a river

quotes.quote: Slow down and meander.
quotes.author: Advice from a river

quotes.quote: Go around the obstacles.
quotes.author: Advice from a river

quotes.quote: Of all the paths you take in life, make sure a few of them are dirt and a few of them take you down the river.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The songs of the river end not at her banks, but in the hearts of those who have loved her.
quotes.author: Buffalo Joe

quotes.quote: The fears we don't face become our limits.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Where the river flows and the rapids are white, is where I'm happiest to be.
quotes.author: Ashley and the Van

quotes.quote: Heaven is a litte closer when you're on the water.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Life is like the river, sometimes it sweeps you gently along and sometimes the rapids come out of nowhere.
quotes.author: Emma Smith

quotes.quote: Real freedom lies in wilderness, not in civilization.
quotes.author: Charles Lindbergh

quotes.quote: No man ever steps in the same river twice, for it is not the same river and he is not the same man.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: We are made to persist. That's how we find out who we are.
quotes.author: Tobias Wolff

quotes.quote: A mind that is stretched by a new experience can never go back to its old dimensions.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Wilderness has a way of measuring you, it provides everything we could possibly need.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Respond to every call that excites your spirit.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: A river seems a magic thing. A magic, moving, living part of the very earth itself.
quotes.author: Laura Gilpin

quotes.quote: Keep close to nature's heart.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: Life is balance. Go with the current.
quotes.author: Advice from a river

quotes.quote: Character develops itself in the stream of life.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Remember to keep your boat pointed downstream and go with the flow.
quotes.author: Advice from a river

quotes.quote: Adventure begins at the outside of your comfort zone.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Rivers are veins of the earth through which the lifeblood returns to the heart.
quotes.author: Roderick Haig-Brown

quotes.quote: Nature never goes out of style.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: We don't stop playing because we grow old, we grow old because we stop playing.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Go where you feel most alive.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: One way to get the most out of life is to look upon it as an adventure.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: As long as you can find the river you can find your way home.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Every exit is an entry somewhere else.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: At the end of the day, your feet should be dirty, your hair messy and your eyes sparkling.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do, so throw off the bowlines, sail away from safe harbor, catch the trade winds in your sails.  Explore, Dream, Discover.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one’s courage.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: If the wind will not serve, take to the oars.
quotes.author: Latin Proverb
